title: Steam Inspired UI
overview:
This CSS Library is inspired by the style of the steam website and the steam client.
It features compontents like the Navigation Bar, Buttons and more. The library can be used as whole or only with the components you want to use.

content.title: Usage
content.text:
You can find out more on how to use the library on its GitHub page.
https://github.com/Fabian-Kleine/steam-inspired-ui-library
